How can we help you?

Web Development

UX and Front End Design
We can help you create a product from scratch, or develop something that improves the way you do business. Either way, we'll keep things simple.

Consulting & Tech Support

From desktop and server administration to network engineering, we've got you covered. We provide enterprise level IT expertise at a fraction of the cost of a full department. Best of all, we speak the language of normal people. Techno jargon not required.

Products

We've created simple solutions to help address our clients' most common technical challenges. Our web products are offered at a fair price with plenty of support. Contact us for details on what we can offer you.

Our Story

Formation Tech was founded in 2013. We started with a mission to help people enjoy the experience of technology again. Receiving tech support or leveraging an awesome piece of software shouldn't be frustrating. Some elements of our work can get very complex, but the opportunity to think critically and come up with creative solutions will always be coupled with our love for working with people.

Who We Are

  • Michael Phillips
    Tech & Jr. Developer

    Michael kicked off his technology career just a few short years ago and has quickly become a go-to troubleshooter and customer service wizard. Joining the Formation Tech team just a few months after its inception, Michael has been acquiring new skills for his IT arsenal; as well honing his natural artistic and design abilities. His artwork is featured on the Formation Tech website.

    Jimmy Apodaca
    Founder & Owner

    Jimmy Apodaca is an IT veteran who is well versed in many facets of technology. He got his start in IT at the same school district he graduated from and has supported instructional technology from the classroom to the district level. Along the way he discovered the power and the thrill of developing software that made his job more fulfilling. Since venturing out to start Formation Tech, his is passion is twofold: Provide enterprise level IT support to schools and businesses of all sizes and develop killer websites and applications to enrich peoples' experience: in school, in work and in life.

    Chris Eich
    Sr. Developer

    After spending 8 years in post secondary education, Chris flirted with web development and has been hooked ever since. He cut his teeth managing simple PHP systems and after a brief dallience in production deployment scripting, he now spends his time as a stylish Ruby on Rails developer. Chris specializes in writing well-honed UI, trying to create attractive and efficient user interfaces and expressive Ruby code for the masses.
